projectGoal: To prepare for and pass the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (CLF-C02) exam.
projectStructure: Repository organized by exam domains: 01-cloud-concepts/, 02-security-and-compliance/, 03-technology-and-services/, 04-billing-and-support/, and labs/ for hands-on practice.
studyApproach: Focus on foundational AWS concepts, hands-on labs, and exam-specific scenarios. Emphasize practical understanding over deep technical implementation.
